title: Classic Special Pack 02 - Alien & Zombie Classic Assets + Extra
description: Six Classic creatures, three Grey Alien creature and three Classic Zombie with easy custom material, change color as you wish! Designed to be versatile for the Modern, Futuristic or Medieval Horror/Action game!
longDescription:
Six Classic creatures, three Grey Alien creature and three Classic Zombie with easy custom material, change color as you wish! Designed to be versatile for the Modern, Futuristic or Medieval Horror/Action game!


CLASSIC ASSETS - Stigma Studios Introduces a new type of asset called "classic". Dive into a world of classic timeless monsters and creatures, adding an enchanting aesthetic to your games!
CLASSIC LIMITED PROMO - If you have purchased one or more stigma studios products from the Classic series you will be able to have exclusive discounts on characters of your choice. For more information visit the official discord.


Following you can find a Detail Overview video, Demonstration Video and tutorial to retarget UE4 animation to Classic Alien 04, 05, 06 & Zombie 04, 05, 06 Classic Characters


Classic Special Pack 02 - Detail Overview Video

How Retarget Animation to Classic Special Pack 02 Characters

How to retarget Unreal Engine 5


The separate products can be found here:

Grey Alien 04 - Classic Assets + Extra

Grey Alien 05 - Classic Assets + Extra

Grey Alien 06 - Classic Assets + Extra

Zombie 04 - Classic Assets + Extra

Zombie 05 - Classic Assets + Extra

Zombie 06 - Classic Assets + Extra


This type of assets aims to offer a convenient character and does not reflect the quality of "premium" assets. Updates are planned for this assets in the future and may increase in price!


Join on Discord for:

Limited Promo: Special promotions for all users and loyal users.

Product Support: Receive support for the purchased product.

Update: Track the status of new upcoming production.

Suggestions: Vote the next pack or recommend what you would like see next or future update.


Thanks for the support!


Epic Games Animation is used for display/example only.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Full 3D Character: Six 3d model to get a unique design impact for your game.
  • Extra: Easy change color material!
  •  Versatile Design: Model designed to be used in different artistic contexts and be versatile.


Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes*

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

Animated: Yes ( ONLY Epic Games Default Third Person Animation for Demonstration purpose retarget to CA04,05,06 CZ04,05,06)

Number of Main Characters: 6

Vertex counts of Main Character: 10.000 - 25.000

Tris counts of Main Character: 25.000 - 50.000


*Character can be bigger/thiner than Unreal Mannequin, watch the video overview for more information.


Texture Resolutions: 4096x4096

Number of Animations: 8 (ONLY Epic Games Default Third Person Animation for Demonstration purpose retarget to CA04,05,06 CZ04,05,06)


PoseA

ThirdPersonIdle

ThirdPersonWalk

ThirdPersonRun

ThirdPersonJump_Start

ThirdPersonJump_Loop

ThirdPersonJump_End

ThirdPerson_Jump


This animation is the Default animation of Epic Games, all rights reserved. Only for Demonstration purposes.
